name: Marvel Quotes Quiz | Marvel Comics | 10 Questions

questions.text: 'I'm six foot seven, and bright green, people are going to stare at me no matter how I dress.' Who am I?
questions.explanation:
She-Hulk.

	She-Hulk is the cousin of the Incredible Hulk!

questions.text: 'I'm not sure I have what it takes to protect the whole darn cosmos, but if I'm the one you want for the job, I'll do my best to do it.' Who am I?
questions.explanation:
Quasar.

	Quasar is in the group called The Avengers!

questions.text: 'I never realized the pure joy of unadulterated mayhem for a good cause' Who am I?
questions.explanation:
The Hulk.

	Hulk is in the mutant team known as Pantheon.

questions.text: 'This place is coming apart faster than our battle plan.' Who am I?
questions.explanation:
Domino.

	Domino is second in command in the X-force.

questions.text: 'It was I who chose the dark paths I now tread as it is I who must walk them alone.' Who am I?
'The innocent blood spilled here tonight must be avenged.' Who am I?
'I'm the best there is at what I do but what I do ain't very nice.' Who am I?
questions.explanation:
Wolverine.

	Wolverine's entire skeleton is outlined with adamantium the hardest type of solid!

questions.text: 'I kill only those who deserve killing!' Who am I?
questions.explanation:
Punisher.

	The Punisher's family were killed by the Mafia, so he plans to destroy all criminals!

questions.text: 'I need no special weapons! My body is weapons enough!' Who am I?
'I can be pretty self-reliant, especially when I've got other selves to rely on.' Who am I?
